data.title: MARATHON: Registration information
data.text:
Anniversary Buddy Bär

The 22 cm high Buddy Bear will appear for the first time in the BERLIN-MARATHON design (let yourself be surprised!). Each bear is completely handmade.

The Buddy Bear stands for Berlin like no other souvenir. As ambassador of the city he stands for tolerance, friendliness, cheerfulness, versatility and acceptance. The BMW BERLIN-MARATHON has also dedicated itself to these values and we are happy if they are carried around the world by our participants in the form of this souvenir.

⇒ € 79,50

50 years BERLIN-MARATHON coin

The 13 world records that were run on the fastest course in the world in Berlin on the front, the top sights along the route on the back. Get your beautiful memory of this very special anniversary.

See the design here.

⇒ € 27,90

Stories from Duckburg “Lustiges Taschenbuch” at the 50th BMW BERLIN-MARATHON

We are celebrating the 50th Berlin Marathon and the stars from Duckburg are not missing out on this mega event. In this special edition, even Donald Duck joins in and shows true sporting spirit! For Amanal Petros, who stands for community and sustainability, he is the winner of hearts.

⇒ € 12,95

Massage before your race

Pick up your race kit in the days leading up to the race and enjoy a 20-minute massage at the MARATHON EXPO.

⇒ € 15,-

Maurten Race Pack

Fuel your race day right with this product selection from Maurten — Official On-Course Nutrition Partner:

1 x Solid 160

1 x Solid 160 C

3 x Gel 100

1 x Drink Mix 320

1 x Drink Mix 160

a limited edition 500 ml Berlin 2024 bottle

1 x Marathon Fuel Guide

⇒ € 25,-

The Maurten Race Pack will be issued at MARATHON EXPO 2024. This product is provided by Maurten AB. In the event of an order, Maurten AB is the contractual partner.

Bib Number Magnets (BibBits)

Good bye safety pins. Attach your bib number with the BMW BERLIN-MARATHON bibbits and get running.

⇒ € 9,90 per set of 4 magnets

Medal engraving

Pre-order the medal-engraving and have your personal finisher time engraved in your medal in the finish area.

⇒ € 12,-

Photo & Video Package

Sportograf will be the official photo partner for the BMW BERLIN-MARATHON 2024, covering your special moments from start to finish and in between! The more than 40 photographers will capture your ups and downs, your smiles and tough times and are offering stunning perspectives including the famous sights of Berlin in the background. Once the event is over, your photos will be online within the shortest time - sorted by bib number and professionally post-processed. You want personalized photos and a appr. 1 minute video of you on the home stretch, telling the story of your BMW BERLIN-MARATHON 2024? Make sure to have your bib number visible at all times, run at your best and Sportograf will do the rest.

⇒ € 39,90

Sportograf offers a presale for your personal photo and video package at a reduced price of 39,90 Euro. Once the photos are online, you automatically receive an email with the download link to your race photos. The package includes all your personal images, as well as a great selection of scenery and impression shots of the event.

Donation

With the help of your environmental donation, we support regional environmental and nature conservation projects. This is part of our joint commitment with WWF Germany for a more sustainable marathon. Together with you, we can do a lot of good and preserve and reclaim areas worthy of nature conservation.

Before you start with the registration, we would like to ask you to take 2-3 minutes of time to protect your health by completing our non-binding and free health check.

Regular physical activity has a positive effect on your health. However, sport is no guarantee for a risk-free state of health. Familial risk factors, but also lifestyle-related risks are not always in direct correlation with your training condition and should be known in advance. Therefore, please be honest with yourself when answering the questions.

With the PAPS test, we want to help you become aware of your own state of health—there are no consequences for your eligibility to participate. The recommendation at the end of the test is made available to you for your personal and voluntary further use. The PAPS test does not replace a visit to the doctor and cannot provide 100% certainty of an existing or emerging risk. The collected, non-personalized data will not be handed over to the organiser. The data may be used in anonymised and encrypted form for scientific purposes by the Medical Board of SCC EVENTS.
